app.title: Samvargani
app.description: Samvargani is an interesting game that helps you learn Hindi. It is a great way to improve your Hindi vocabulary and is a must-have app for people interested in learning Hindi.
app.downloadInstructions: To download the app, search for 'Samvargani' on the App Store

author.name: Aruhant Mehta
author.bio: Aruhant Mehta is a 17 year old student who is enthusiastic about computer programming and technology. He is currently learning Python and Flutter. He is also a student of the Indian classical dance Kathak.

page1.title: Welcome to Samvargani - daily word game!
page1.body: Guess an interesting new word everyday, and improve your vocabulary!

page2.title: You will be shown the length and structure of the target word divided in cells.
page2.body: You will also be shown the half-letters and matras in that word.

page3.title: After you make a guess, observe the colour of each cell in your guess-word.

body.line1: The letter is present in the target word at that same position.
body.line2: The letter is present in the target word but at a different position.
body.line3: The letter is not present in the target word at all.

page4.title: Now, can you guess this three letter word with no matras and no half letters?
page4.body: Use the following pre-filled guesses. Tap on a cell if you have any confusion with its colour and meaning.

tutorial1.title: Tutorial 1
tutorial1.mainMessage:
Wow! That was fast!
Now, let's try a word with a matra!

tutorial2.title: Tutorial 2
tutorial2.mainMessage:
You're the Best!
For your last tutorial, try each guess on your own!

tutorial3.title: Tutorial 3
tutorial3.mainMessage:
Great Job!
Now, proceed with today's daily word!
Come back everyday to learn a new word!

cellTooltip.correct: This cell exactly contains '{}' in this position.
cellTooltip.correctVyanjanWithAdhaRemoveAdha: This cell contains the letter '{}' but not with the '{}' half-letter.
cellTooltip.correctVyanjanWithAdhaAddMatra: This cell contains '{}' but it contains an additional matra.
cellTooltip.correctVyanjanWithAdhaAddAdha: This cell contains '{}' but it contains an additional half-letter.
cellTooltip.correctVyanjanWithMatraRemoveMatra: This cell contains the letter '{}' but not with the '{}' matra.
cellTooltip.correctVyanjanWithMatraAddAdha: This cell contains '{}' but it contains an additional half-letter.
cellTooltip.correctVyanjanWithMatraAddMatra: This cell contains '{}' but it contains an additional matra.
cellTooltip.correctVyanjanWithMatraAndAdhaRemoveMatr: This cell contains the letter '{}' but without the '{}' matra and without the '{}' half-letter.
This cell contains '{}' but without the '{}' matra.
cellTooltip.correctVyanjanWithMatraAndAdhaRemoveAdha: This cell contains '{}' but without the '{}' half-letter.
cellTooltip.correctVyanjanWithoutMatraAndAdhaAddMatr: This cell contains the letter '{}' but with a matra.
cellTooltip.correctVyanjanWithoutMatraAndAdhaAddAdha: This cell contains the letter '{}' but with a half-letter.
cellTooltip.correctVyanjanWithoutMatraAndAdhaAddMatr: This cell contains the letter '{}' but with a matra and a half-letter.
cellTooltip.misplacedVyanjanWithAdhaRemoveAdha: '{}' is present in the word but not at this position and without the '{}' half-letter.
cellTooltip.misplacedVyanjanWithAdhaAddMatra: '{}' is present in the word but not at this position, and it contains an additional matra.
cellTooltip.misplacedVyanjanWithAdhaAddAdha: '{}' is present in the word but not at this position, and it contains an additional half-letter.
cellTooltip.misplacedVyanjanWithMatraRemoveMatra: '{}' is present in the word but not at this position and without the '{}' matra.
cellTooltip.misplacedVyanjanWithMatraAddAdha: '{}' is present in the word but not at this position, and it contains an additional half-letter.
cellTooltip.misplacedVyanjanWithMatraAddMatra: '{}' is present in the word but not at this position, and it contains an additional matra.
cellTooltip.misplacedVyanjanWithMatraAndAdhaRemoveMa: '{}' is present in the word but not at this position and without the '{}' matra and without the '{}' half-letter.
'{}' is present in the word but not at this position and without the '{}' matra.
cellTooltip.misplacedVyanjanWithMatraAndAdhaRemoveAd: '{}' is present in the word but not at this position and without the '{}' half-letter.
cellTooltip.misplacedVyanjanWithoutMatraAndAdhaAddMa: '{}' is present in the word but not at this position and with a matra.
cellTooltip.misplacedVyanjanWithoutMatraAndAdhaAddAd: '{}' is present in the word but not at this position and with a half-letter.
cellTooltip.misplacedVyanjanWithoutMatraAndAdhaAddMa: '{}' is present in the word but not at this position and with a matra and a half-letter.
cellTooltip.misplacedWithMatra: '{}' is present in the word with this correct matra but not at this position.
cellTooltip.misplacedWithAdha: '{}' is present in the word with this correct half-letter but not at this position.
cellTooltip.misplacedWithMatraAndAdha: '{}' is present in the word with this correct matra and half-letter, but not at this position.
cellTooltip.misplacedWithoutMatraAndAdha: '{}' is present in the word just like this without any matra or half-letter but not at this position.
cellTooltip.misplaced: '{}' is present in the word exactly like this but at a different position.
cellTooltip.incorrect: '{}' is not present in the word in any form.
cellTooltip.incorrectButContainsAdha: Full '{}' is not present in the word, but remember it still contains the '{}' half-letter.
cellTooltip.emptyWithMatra: This cell contains a letter along with the '{}' matra.
cellTooltip.emptyWithAdha: This cell contains a letter along with the '{}' half-letter.
cellTooltip.emptyWithMatraAndAdha: This cell contains a letter along with the '{}' half-letter and the '{}' matra.
cellTooltip.emptyWithoutMatraAndAdha: This cell contains a letter without any matra or half-letter.

gameMessages.wrongWordLength: You have entered a {} letter word, but the correct answer is a {} letter word.
gameMessages.notInDictonary: Your answer '{}' is not in the Hindi dictionary.
gameMessages.matraError: Please type the matra ('{}') after the vyanjan and not vice-versa.
gameMessages.aoError: Pehaps you meant to type 'ओ', not 'अो'.
gameMessages.auError: Pehaps you meant to type 'औ', not 'अौ'.
gameMessages.incorrect: For assistance, you may tap on the cells, and see what they mean.
gameMessages.alreadyGuessed: You have already tried this word.
gameMessages.halantError: '्' must be followed by a vyanjan.
gameMessages.addedNoMatras: Try adding matras to '{}' according to the structure shown above. The correct matras are also marked green on the keybaord.

startingMessages.containsTra: Just remember that 'क्ष', 'त्र', 'ज्ञ', and 'श्र' is each considered a single letter.
startingMessages.containsAdha: Remember that half-letters in a cell are present along with a full letter. Use the '्' symbol for a half-letter.
startingMessages.basicMessage: Remember, to find out which letters are in the answer, you can also make gusses that do not follow the above matra structure.

dailyGame.line3: In the meantime, try practice mode!
